update public.t_cust_product set cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_type = #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounts_name = #{accountsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_keyword = #{titleKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.product_id, a.cust_id, a.platform_type, a.accounts_name, a.item_id, a.title_keyword, a.remark,b.cust_code,b.cust_name from t_cust_product a inner join t_customer b on a.cust_id = b.cust_id
select a.product_id, a.cust_id, a.platform_type, a.accounts_name, a.item_id, a.title_keyword, a.remark,b.cust_code,b.cust_name from t_cust_product a inner join t_customer b on a.cust_id = b.cust_id

and is_del = 0
and a.cust_id = #{search.custId,javaType=INTEGER}
and accounts_name like '%'||#{search.accountsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

and platform_type like '%'||#{search.platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
